topic.title: How to know your IP into ZeroNet?
topic.body: Hello,i search a simple way to know my IP into ZeroNet SyS.Thanks in advance.

1_1L6xF49cuRomTe1Dae675yqRHgH8JsFsZf.body: But ZeroNet Wasn't mask the IP in the network?
Because the IP into the site that you say me,show my real IP address.
Ok Thanks,how to install TOR in debian?
